languages.text: Представитель Эксплораторского флота Осознание Оптикон-22 готов платить за сведения о планетах, изученных Вольным Торговцем.
The representative of the Explorator Cognisance Fleet, Opticon-22, is willing to pay for information on planets studied by the Rogue Trader.
languages.original_text: Представитель Эксплораторского флота Осознание Оптикон-22 готов платить за сведения о планетах, изученных Вольным Торговцем.

traits.locale_text: The representative of the Explorator Cognisance Fleet, Opticon-22, is willing to pay for information on planets studied by the Rogue Trader.

languages.text: 真理开拓者舰队的代表奥普蒂孔22号需要行商浪人帮忙研究行星数据，他愿意为这些研究数据支付报酬。
languages.original_text: The representative of the Explorator Cognisance Fleet, Opticon-22, is willing to pay for information on planets studied by the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: 真理开拓者舰队的代表奥普蒂孔22号需要行商浪人帮忙研究行星数据，他愿意为这些研究数据支付报酬。

languages.text: コグニサンス探索艦隊の代表であるオプティコン-22は、自由開拓者が調査した惑星に関する情報に対価を払うことに乗り気だ。
languages.original_text: The representative of the Explorator Cognisance Fleet, Opticon-22, is willing to pay for information on planets studied by the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: コグニサンス探索艦隊の代表であるオプティコン-22は、自由開拓者が調査した惑星に関する情報に対価を払うことに乗り気だ。

languages.text: El representante de la Flota Exploradora Consciencia, Opticon-22, está dispuesto a pagar por información sobre los planetas que ha estudiado {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente.
languages.original_text: The representative of the Explorator Cognisance Fleet, Opticon-22, is willing to pay for information on planets studied by the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: El representante de la Flota Exploradora Consciencia, Opticon-22, está dispuesto a pagar por información sobre los planetas que ha estudiado {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente.

languages.text: Opticon-22, der Vertreter der Explorator-Flotte "Erkenntnis", ist bereit, {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} für Informationen über Planeten zu bezahlen.
languages.original_text: The representative of the Explorator Cognisance Fleet, Opticon-22, is willing to pay for information on planets studied by the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Opticon-22, der Vertreter der Explorator-Flotte "Erkenntnis", ist bereit, {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} für Informationen über Planeten zu bezahlen.

languages.text: Le représentant de la Flotte de la Connaissance des Explorators, Opticon-22, est disposé à rémunérer {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} pour toute information concernant les planètes étudiées.
languages.original_text: The representative of the Explorator Cognisance Fleet, Opticon-22, is willing to pay for information on planets studied by the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Le représentant de la Flotte de la Connaissance des Explorators, Opticon-22, est disposé à rémunérer {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} pour toute information concernant les planètes étudiées.

languages.text: Keşiftör Malumat Filosu temsilcisi Opticon-22, Hür Tacir'in incelediği gezegenlere dair bilgiler için ödeme yapmaya hazır.
languages.original_text: The representative of the Explorator Cognisance Fleet, Opticon-22, is willing to pay for information on planets studied by the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Keşiftör Malumat Filos'unun temsilcisi Opticon-22, Hür Tacir'in incelediği gezegenlere dair bilgiler karşılığında ödeme yapmayı teklif ediyor.
